key.name: name
key.description: Consumer name, preferably instance name. Consumer name can be used by queues when reserving messages from broker for processing.

key.name: queue
key.description: Queue name for this consumer (consuming server). There must exist a registered utility providing ITaskQueue with this name.

key.name: concurrent_limit
key.description: Maximum concurrent task limit for this consumer. The limit should be less than zserver-thread or just 1.

key.name: retry_max_count
key.description: Maximum ZPublisher retry count for requests dispatched by this consumer. Once the limit has been exceeded, the conflicting task may be permanently skipped, depending the used queue.
